name: eyetracker
description: Eye tracking communication app for Rett syndrome

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
